contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|TMS}} '''TMS''' may be an abbreviation for: {{TOC right}} == Organizations == * [[The Minerals, Metals & Materials Society]], a professional organization for materials scientists and engineers * [[Texas Memory Systems]], a manufacturer of solid-state drives * [[Tokyo Movie Shinsha]], a major Japanese animation studio now known as TMS Entertainment * [[Toronto Montessori Schools]], a Montessori school in Richmond Hill, Ontario * [[Toyota Motor Sales, U.S.A., Inc.]], an American subsidiary of Toyota Motor Corporation * [[Tribune Media Services]], a syndication company owned by the Tribune Company * [[Trinity Mathematical Society]], the oldest mathematical university society in the United Kingdom == Schools == * [[Tabb Middle School]], a middle school in Yorktown, Virginia * [[Tamanend Middle School]], a middle school in Pennsylvania * [[Tech Music Schools]], contemporary music performance school in London * [[Temasek Secondary School]], a secondary school in Bedok, Singapore * [[Tenafly Middle School]], a middle school in Tenafly, New Jersey * [[Toano Middle School]], a middle school in Toano, Virginia * [[Triadelphia Middle School]], a school located near Wheeling, West Virginia * [[Tyrrell Middle School]], a middle school in Wolcott, Connecticut == Chemistry == * [[Tetramethylsilane]], a chemical compound commonly used as a chemical shift standard in <sup>1</sup>H and <sup>13</sup>C NMR spectroscopy * [[Trimethylsilanol]], an organosilicon chemical compound * [[Trimethylsilyl]], a functional group in chemistry * [[Tricaine methanesulfonate]] or ''tricaine mesylate'', an anesthetic for aquatic animals == Medicine & psychology == * [[Tension myositis syndrome]], a medical diagnosis for psychogenic back pain, and various musculoskeletal issues * [[Total motile spermatozoa]] * [[Transcranial magnetic stimulation]], a psychological or medical research and treatment technique * [[Transactive Memory System]], a social psychological theory of distributed memory storage == Sports == * [[Tennis Masters Series]], a former name for the Association of Tennis Professionals' Masters Series, a professional tennis tour * [[Test Match Special]], a United Kingdom radio programme providing live commentary on cricket matches * [[Texas Motor Speedway]], race track in Fort Worth, Texas * [[TMS Ringsted]], a Danish handball club competing in the Danish Handball League == Television == * [[The Morning Show (TV program)|''The Morning Show'' (TV program)]], the top rating Australian morning program * ''[[This Movie Sucks!]]'', a Canadian satiric television show featuring riffs of bad movies * ''[[That Metal Show]]'', a US television show about Hard Rock and Heavy Metal == Music == * [[TMS (production team)]], an English songwriting and record production team * [[T. M. Soundararajan]], a leading Tamil film singer == Technology == * [[Tape Management System]], computer software used for the management of computer backup tapes * [[TrackMania Sunrise]], a computer racing game * [[Advanced traffic management system]], a subsystem of an Intelligent Transportation System * [[Translation Management System]], computer software used for the management of translating software or documents * [[Transportation management system]], a category of logistics software products * [[Transport management system]], an SAP process for managing transports * [[Tile Map Service]], a standard for downloading maps * A Tag Management System for managing Web [[page tags]]. == Other uses == * [[São Tomé International Airport]], IATA code * [[Truth maintenance system]], a knowledge representation method * True Money Supply, an index created by economist [[Murray Rothbard]] that represents the amount of money available for immediate use in the economy {{disambiguation}}
